channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4934|2024-08-03T01:55:46.065Z -- sophos -- sophos%20web%20appliance
item.description: A post-auth command injection vulnerability in the exception wizard of Sophos Web Appliance older than version 4.3.10.4 allows administrators to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-3226|2024-08-03T01:00:10.556Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability allows admins to execute code via SSL VPN configuration uploads in Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-1807|2024-08-03T00:16:59.853Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: Multiple SQLi vulnerabilities in Webadmin allow for privilege escalation from admin to super-admin in Sophos Firewall older than version 18.5 MR4 and version 19.0 MR1.

item.title: CVE-2022-3709|2024-08-03T01:20:57.033Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A stored XSS vulnerability allows admin to super-admin privilege escalation in the Webadmin import group wizard of Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-3696|2024-08-03T01:14:03.340Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A post-auth code injection vulnerability allows admins to execute code in Webadmin of Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-3236|2024-08-03T01:00:10.526Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A code injection vulnerability in the User Portal and Webadmin allows a remote attacker to execute code in Sophos Firewall version v19.0 MR1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2022-3711|2024-08-03T01:20:57.113Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A post-auth read-only SQL injection vulnerability allows users to read non-sensitive configuration database contents in the User Portal of Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-3713|2024-08-03T01:20:57.132Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A code injection vulnerability allows adjacent attackers to execute code in the Wifi controller of Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-3980|2024-08-03T01:27:54.013Z -- sophos -- sophos%20mobile%20managed%20on-premises
item.description: An XML External Entity (XEE) vulnerability allows server-side request forgery (SSRF) and potential code execution in Sophos Mobile managed on-premises between versions 5.0.0 and 9.7.4.

item.title: CVE-2022-3710|2024-08-03T01:20:57.030Z -- sophos -- sophos%20firewall
item.description: A post-auth read-only SQL injection vulnerability allows API clients to read non-sensitive configuration database contents in the API controller of Sophos Firewall releases older than version 19.5 GA.

item.title: CVE-2022-4901|2024-08-03T01:55:45.824Z -- sophos -- sophos%20connect%20client
item.description: Multiple stored XSS vulnerabilities in Sophos Connect versions older than 2.2.90 allow Javascript code to run in the local UI via a malicious VPN configuration that must be manually loaded by the victim.
